string-array.name: ui_texts
string-array.item: Different languages have different rules for grammatical agreement with quantity. In English, for example, the quantity 1 is a special case.

All Android devices have two file storage areas: "internal" and "external" storage. These names come from the early days of Android, when most devices offered built-in non-volatile memory (internal storage), plus a removable storage medium such as a micro SD card (external storage).

The user interface of an activity often changes in response to user input and other events. For example, an activity that contains a form where users can type search queries can hide the form when the user submits it and show a list of search results in its place.
Build a user interface that's flexible enough to fit perfectly on any screen and how to create different interaction patterns that are optimized for different screen sizes.
